sentences.en: Folic acid supplementation is used to improve erythropoiesis in chronic hemolytic anemia.
sentences.cn: 慢性溶血性贫血患者使用叶酸治疗可促进红细胞生成.

sentences.en: Hemolytic icterus occurs in the neonate of the horse and swine.
sentences.cn: 溶血性黄疸发生于马和猪的初生幼畜.

sentences.en: Inherited deficiency of pyruvate kinase, a key glycolytic enzyme, causes ATP deficiency, which leads to reduced RBC life span and hemolytic anemia.
sentences.cn: 糖酵解的关键酶--丙酮酸激酶，如果它有遗传缺陷，就导致会ATP缺乏、红细胞寿命缩短和溶血性贫血。

sentences.en: It does not prevent infection by hemolytic streptococci.
sentences.cn: 它并不能防止溶血性链球菌的感染.

sentences.en: Objective : To analyze the clinical features and treatment outcomes of autoirnmune hemolytic anemia ( AIHA ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究自身免疫性溶血性贫血 ( AIHA ) 的临床特征,进一步指导治疗.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To establish the rabbit model of experimental endocarditis hemolytic streptococcus.
sentences.cn: 目的: 建立一种简单易行而且成功率高的兔细菌性心内膜炎模型.

sentences.en: Objective : To improve recognization of treatment to autoimmune hemolytic anemia.
sentences.cn: 目的: 提高对自身免疫性溶血性贫血治疗的认识.

sentences.en: Objective To analyse the relapse rate and risk factors of autoimmune hemolytic anemia ( AIHA ) and Evans syndrome.
sentences.cn: 目的　了解自身免疫性溶血性贫血 ( AIHA ) 和Evans综合征复发率及其相关因素.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the application of columm agglutination technique ( CAT ) in diagnosing autoimmune hemolytic anemia ( AIHA ).
sentences.cn: 目的　探讨微柱凝集体技术在诊断自身免疫性溶血性贫血 ( AIHA ) 中的应用.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the clinical implications of IgG subclass in autoimmune hemolytic anemia ( AIHA ).
sentences.cn: 目的　研究温抗体型自身免疫性溶血性贫血IgG亚型及其临床意义.

sentences.en: Objective To explore effective detection methods of Beta Hemolytic Streptococcus so as to improve detecting level.
sentences.cn: 目的探索乙型溶血性链球菌的有效检测方法,为提高此类检测检出率提供依据.

sentences.en: One clone that hemolytic activity indicating the presence of an intact gene was identified.
sentences.cn: 其中一株具溶血活性,显示该选殖株所含的重组质体带有完整的细胞溶解毒素基因.

sentences.en: The kinds of the antierthyrocyte antibody were tested in 19 cases of autoimmune hemolytic anemia ( AIHA ) .
sentences.cn: 本文报道19例自身免疫溶血性 贫血,行红细胞抗体免疫分型.

sentences.en: The major adverse effect of ribavirin is hemolytic anemia.
sentences.cn: 利巴韦林的主要副作用是溶血性贫血.

sentences.en: The third is the hemolytic type.
Tonsillitis: Inflammatory infection of the tonsils, usually with hemolytic streptococci or viruses.
sentences.cn: 扁桃腺炎: 为炎症性感染, 通常由溶血性链球菌或病毒引起.

words.tran_cn: [生化] 溶血素，溶红血球素（等于haemolysin）
[生理][免疫] 溶血（现象）；血细胞溶解

trans.tran_en: of or relating to the disintegration of red blood cells
